title: thunderbird login
content: I have recently downloaded and installed thunderbird on a new computer running window 11 pro. Thunderbird now asks for my password twice in quick succession upon logging in. This has never happened before. There are now error messages or pop-ups. To see my inbox with new emails, i have to enter the second one. I can see the inbox after the first password entry, but not the new emails.
creator: pumpernickel

title: BCC - Not hiding other emails....
content: In the works of Ai agents that are apparently automating everything (which I absolutely dispise) why is Thunderbird forcing me to send one email at a time so as to not show other recipients who I am also emailing.. I do not have the time for this. I also don't want to invest time into a mail merge set up like Chimp or Octopus. I just want to email 30+ people without the others seeing each other. But when I have tested with thunderbird with one customer email and my own as BCC - when I get the email in my inbox it literaly says - FROM: MY BUSINESS. - TO: MY CUSTOMER.. (yes my customers email address - not mine).. What is going on here?? I can not spend 45 minutes sending the same email... using copy and paste etc..
creator: hamster540
